title: Bug 49536: Return 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when accessing URL with no deployed webapps
description: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: The expected behavior is for the Tomcat instance to return an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL with no deployed webapps.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat instance
4. Observe that it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content
